Text:
The quality on these is fantastic, easily the best I've found so far.  I'd rather download big files and enjoy the quality than sit through pixelated nonsense.

But, having a really hard time downloading now - Demonoid has been down for some time, and I'm getting 20kB/s...gonna take days at this rate :(

Does it have the developer commentary? Any Subtitles? and what is the resolution?

Thanks, but please mention these things when uploading a torrent.

Resolution: 840x480px;

Audio Tracks: 1, English, no commentary.

Video Track: no subtitles.

Good quality, so far, watched the extended pilot, and it's not the clean version. (it is the one where Gob says "Trick is what a whore does for money. ..Or cocaine!")
